summary: Comprehensive testing of KasaBurger Kiosk Admin Category Management feature completed. All backend APIs working (12/12 tests passed). Frontend UI fully functional - tabs, category CRUD, reorder arrows, and product management all working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/kiosk/categories - Returns list of 6 default categories sorted by order
POST /api/kiosk/categories - Creates new category with auto-generated ID
PUT /api/kiosk/categories/{id} - Updates category name and icon
DELETE /api/kiosk/categories/{id} - Returns 400 for categories with products
POST /api/kiosk/products - Creates new product with UUID
Kiosk Admin page loads with Ürünler and Kategoriler tabs
Kategoriler tab shows 6 categories with icons and product counts
Yeni Kategori button opens dialog with name input and emoji picker
Edit button opens dialog with pre-filled category data
Reorder arrows (↑↓) work - tested moving Premium above Et Burger
Delete buttons disabled for categories with products
Ürünler tab shows 37 products with images, prices, and categories
Yeni Ürün button available for adding products

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: POST /api/kiosk/products returned id: null because model_dump() included id: None which overwrote generated UUID
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Changed to product.model_dump(exclude={'id'}) to exclude id from input

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: PUT /api/kiosk/products/{id} returned null because update set id: None from model_dump()
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Changed to product.model_dump(exclude={'id'}) to preserve original product ID

critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper separation of category and product management
CategoryReorderRequest wrapper model correctly handles path conflict with PUT /categories/{id}
Delete protection for categories with products works correctly
Toast notifications (sonner) provide good user feedback
seed_data_creation: Created and deleted TEST_Kategori during UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Kiosk Admin Category Management fully functional. Navigate to /kiosk-admin, click Kategoriler tab to manage categories. Features: Add new category with emoji icon, edit existing categories, reorder with ↑↓ arrows, delete empty categories (disabled for categories with products). Products tab shows all kiosk products with CRUD operations. All APIs use real MongoDB - no mocking. Fixed 2 bugs in kiosk.py during testing (product ID generation).
